txt.en: 'The Morthond, the great river that flows through these lands, begins from within the Paths of the Dead. Rumour is Lenn Dûskud, a pond within the ancient city, has been corrupted by the dead within. If those waters were to find their way into the Morthrond the entirety of this region would be irrevocably harmed.\n\n'Venture north to the Paths of the Dead, find this city and remove any ruthless rune-stones within this pond that could corrupt the waters.'
Golusel is in Dol Amroth.\n\nGolusel will be pleased to hear the waters have been cleansed.
A pool of foetid water is in the ancient city within the Paths of the Dead.
'With the Ruthless Dead angry and stirred up, we will have to watch these waters more closely.'
Removed ruthless rune-stones from Lenn Dûskud ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Remove ruthless rune-stones from Lenn Dûskud ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Lenn Dûskud, a small pond, is at Kêr Izel, within the Paths of the Dead, far to the north of Dol Amroth.\n\nGolusel asked you to venture to a pond within the Paths of the Dead and clear it of any foul objects.
